name: places/ChIJIR-RR0BZwokRBo__SDAnEtw
adrFormatAddress: 1865 Broadway, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: I was recommended to Dr Shah for treatment with neck pain I was experiencing which turned out to be a bad herniated disk. My very first day meeting him I knew instantly I was in good hands He was very thorough in his examinations, listening and answering any questions I had. Before, during and after my procedure he was completely transparent and was always in communication via calls, emails, or text. I never felt like I was only “just another patient” to him and it truly shows he loves what he does. Highly recommend !!!!

originalText.text: I can't express enough gratitude for the outstanding care provided by Dr. Neel Shah. From the initial consultation to the cervical artificial disc replacement surgery, he demonstrated exceptional professionalism and genuine concern for my well-being. Dr. Shah is thorough in his explanations, ensuring that I fully understood every aspect of the procedure. The surgery itself was a success, and I am on the path to recovery with confidence. I highly recommend Dr. Shah for his expertise, compassionate approach, and the remarkable care he provides

originalText.text:
Dr. Shah is a really good Doctor he is really in toon with his patients and he makes sure all their concerns they have are handled.

Really easygoing person and always greet you with a smile. If I needed an orthopedic surgeon I would go to Dr. Shah.

originalText.text: Dr Shah was very easy to talk to and patient with all my questions. My procedure went extremely well and the followups were thorough and professional. I can endorse him without reservation.

originalText.text: Dr. Shah is a great provider, very attentive and knowledgeable. He takes time to develop relationships with his patients and fully understand their concerns in order to provide the best care possible, highly recommend!
